name: mipOS Integrator
description: 1 or 40 Dark Kitchen, 1 or 100 restaurants. Everything in a tablet to manage thousands of orders by Delivery.
shortDescription: A better experience for Dark Kitchen
title: Manage several restaurants from dark kitchen
subtitle: Web and tablet design

seo.title: mipOS Interger: Multiple dark kitchens on one screen - Comandos
seo.description: +8 screens per kitchen summed up in 1 was the great result of mipOS Interger with Comandos. Have you ever managed a dark kitchen?

sections.description: Each brand has one tablet per delivery app. Now imagine having 30 brands. Restaurants - in this case Dark Kitchen - have a complex operation within a single kitchen. Many have a space set aside to store hundreds of tablets.

sections.title: One kitchen for many brands can be chaos

items.title: The challenge
items.description: Create a great product to simplify the operation of up to 40 tablets on a single device.
list: Hundreds of orders coming in at the same time
Order status and sales reports for each delivery app and each brand

items.title: Starting the process
items.description: In partnership with Muncher we visited dark kitchens. We learned about ordering and delivery problems.
list: Some with order delivery tracking problems.
Turn on and off the brands in the delivery apps according to schedules and eventualities of the day.

items.title: Customer Journey
list: We visited +5 Dark Kitchens to understand their daily life
On average, each kitchen served 30 brands in a single day. This translated into hundreds of menus, promotions and profit margins.

sections.description: Having the different menus of different brands on one screen with easy integration with mipOS accounts was the secret of its growth.
sections.title: All delivery apps and menu on a single screen

comment.text: Starting with Comandos was accelerating everything from 0 to 100 in a matter of weeks. The best part: nothing was done without consulting UX and product adoption statistics.

sections.title: We eliminate all the tablets and we are left with only one

items.title: Maximum efficiency
items.description: A roadmap created by 3 teams: devs + designate + user priorities.
list: A new way to unify all menus: Uber Eats + Didi Foods + Rappi + iFood, among others.
Sever and data architecture to make the right decisions
Special attention to learn and shut down cooking from mipOS and not from every delivery app tablet

items.title: Order delivery control
list: We created a monitoring and delivery system unique in the market up to that moment.
The dark kitchen is able to know the real status of each order with the assigned delivery person.
Para la gerencia significó tener un gran control de la operación.

items.title: Thousands of orders without chaos
list: We increased the average ticket by 40% as a result of better menu control.
In an average integration of 4 delivery apps, we were able to reduce 2 jobs.
